title: 35 Simple and Appropriate Agricultural Tools and Machines That Are Very Useful

tasks.task: Follow the sheep and make sure they stay in the field.
subtasks: Lead the sheep dog to the field.
Keep an eye on the sheep to ensure they don't escape.
Maybe lead the sheep back to the field if they try to leave.

tasks.task: Drive the tractor and attach the flails to mow hay.
subtasks: Secure the flail attachment onto the tractor.
Operate the tractor to drive around the field.
Start the flail mower and adjust its speed.
Guide the tractor around the field to cut the hay evenly.

tasks.task: Check the feed lines for the bees.
Load the hay into the trailer.
Check for signs of animal grazing in the fields.
Gather the bees and move them to a new location.
Operate the forage harvester to collect hay.
Maintain the irrigation system with a maintenance tractor.**
Operate the baler to collect hay.**
Operate the flail mower to cut hay.**
Check the beehive and ensure proper queen activity.**
Reset the henhouse after egg collection.**
